display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=TW75uQcm9f8Q7kNvwHz6fdo&_nc_oc=Adky327IaUwDKx8R-w9TN9VhfH-ORFU4ZYG4PZUqvQPs9OmXQBUBGGnf88TnTxhrdqg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HKgQfZj1t5V7kIbQLIB0fQ&oh=00_AfHfeJQ3lpAoJjU5kV2IYGJNZd429kPq2Qqe2g9cHW9ApA&oe=6812635D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=UrdEohaD9DcQ7kNvwGRomcM&_nc_oc=AdkUuS0OYEddHSx7hfG2bOngT-YCLhrERJJZfwVbRTVvvMOJ_AuqoCpH2DgzkC2sJJE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HKgQfZj1t5V7kIbQLIB0fQ&oh=00_AfHpbA1xC-XRz3NZ9cIKDd1WKlmU7dd-wa010VrgTCffSw&oe=68124512)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-7xMlWoXKqMQ7kNvwF-VDLi&_nc_oc=AdmP7jAvpDB5ThK6sdHyMAMJqdCvLi3CmpPJvNi75FKlwfZI5Q_CpqFOs54Ohm45Yyo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HKgQfZj1t5V7kIbQLIB0fQ&oh=00_AfFW6QmVco2WwJYuN96cIgrDUxC-4bceX2BVCApU-Y7IcQ&oe=68124B23)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=wdmL9oVfoucQ7kNvwGSL6GN&_nc_oc=AdnxjQdQFNy8LN_WkQ6mGBMdle1wNYfV1d6C8wmJf7R3TEZCXADOpk7JrTyTSfmQsvI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HKgQfZj1t5V7kIbQLIB0fQ&oh=00_AfGYdN55YMyM5f_Mnpa7BAYnLUuXwvlMrgiI-vnU_4aF_A&oe=681241AE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-aklKfeZwRcQ7kNvwEtPvhP&_nc_oc=Adm0UdLs32XT-g5TlP8AC6m4KG3EhELdG-6_2HyS6lZYvNZnJiTgjdYMAeW5KCpRDd8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=HKgQfZj1t5V7kIbQLIB0fQ&oh=00_AfG6XaHHhes9Nx1V5ImYJVJ3TbHqZ0lEa7eGABNyHrASGA&oe=68124996)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
